message_1: Evaluate the expression 3x² - 5xy + 2y² at x=2 and y=3.
message_2:
To evaluate the expression 3x² - 5xy + 2y² at x=2 and y=3, we will substitute the values of x and y into the expression and then simplify.

3(2)² - 5(2)(3) + 2(3)²
= 3(4) - 5(6) + 2(9)
= 12 - 30 + 18
= -18 + 18
= 0

The expression evaluates to 0 at x=2 and y=3.
